MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA5 postcode area of Johnstone. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12.02am. Our engineers have established that there is underground cable fault outside Auchenlodment road and that repairs will be complex so we are arranging generators to restore power, and this should happen by 11.55am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:31am on Wednesday, 03 February 2021
